results.title: James Bond Actors Say Sean Connery ‘Defined an Era and a Style’
results.abstract: Other actors who have portrayed Agent 007 remembered Mr. Connery, who died at 90, for his charm, screen presence and golfing.
To legions of fans who have watched a parade of actors play Agent 007, none played the part as magnetically or as indelibly as Mr. Connery.
results.title: Sean Connery, Who Embodied James Bond and More, Dies at 90
